message: Let's start fair. I'll take the majority, but you get something too.
I'll give you a decent share, but I'm not going to be too generous
Let's meet in the middle. I'll take a bit less, but I'm still keeping the majority.
I'll give you a slightly bigger share, but I'm still not going to let you have it all
I'm willing to give you a fair share, but I'm starting to worry about the dwindling value of the money. Let's come to an agreement soon.
I'm not going to let the value of the money drop too much, but I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share
We're running out of time. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bigger share to make this worth it.
